title: Offline Installation Automation
details: Automated end-to-end offline installation of StackStorm from rpm, deb and source code on RHEL, Ubuntu.
Configured multi-node setups including DB, App, Web nodes with HA support.
Integrated Python, MongoDB, Redis, RabbitMQ, and OpenResty/Nginx installation via shell scripts.
Reduced installation time from 20 days to 1 day with fully offline automation.

title: Upgrade Automation
details: Automated upgrades of StackStorm, Python, MongoDB, Redis, RabbitMQ, OpenResty/Nginx across single and multi-node.
Managed version migrations while maintaining HA integrity and minimal downtime.
Implemented rollback and cleanup scripts for safer upgrade execution.
Standardized upgrade process for repeatable client deployment.

title: Offline Package Download Automation
details: Developed scripts to download all required OS packages (RHEL/Ubuntu) and Python packages for offline installation/upgrades.
Ensured dependency resolution and offline repository organization for multiple Python versions (3.8, 3.9, 3.11, 3.12).
Enabled future-proof offline deployments without internet access across client environments.
Facilitated efficient preparation for installation and upgrade projects at scale.

title: Automation Reporting & Monitoring
details: Developed automation reporting pack to generate daily/weekly/monthly SLA compliance reports.
Integrated reporting with SQL/MongoDB for data persistence and retrieval.
Enabled dashboards for tracking automation adoption, execution failures, and ticket resolution trends.
Provided reusable workflows for client-specific reporting requirements.

title: Multi-Account Migration
details: Migrated orchestration solutions from legacy platforms into StackStorm for 25+ client accounts.
Supported 200++ automation scripts into reusable StackStorm workflows and Ansible playbooks.
Designed modular, scalable packs for multi-tenant environments.
Ensured minimal downtime and high availability during migrations.
